actions: Nourishes Jing and Blood and fills the Marrow.
Tonifies the Kidneys, strengthens Yang, stabilizes Jing and astringes urine.
Warms Ming Men Fire and assists Heart, Kidney and Spleen Yang.
Supplements the Liver, warms the Kidneys, fortifies Yang and astringes Jing.
With Bu Gu Zhi and Yi Zhi Ren, for urinary frequency due to Cold from Deficiency of the Bladder and Kidneys.
Tonifies Kidney Yin and astringes Jing.
Warms the Kidneys and astringes Jing and urine.
Tonifies and stabilizes the Kidneys, tonifies Yang and astringes Jing and urine.
With Yi Zhi Ren and Jin Ying Zi, for urinary frequency or enuresis.
Stabilizes the Kidneys, astringes urine and retains Jing.

syndromes: Kidney Yang Deficiency: Kidney Qi not Consolidate

symptoms: Involuntary urination upon increased intra-abdominal stress
